name: NewsQA
summary: A QA dataset of questions on news articles from CNN, created via crowdworkers. It has ~120k question-answer pairs​:contentReference[oaicite:18]{index=18}. Workers were shown an article’s summary and asked to write questions, then another set found the answers in the article​:contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}.
size: ~119,633 questions collected, with ~100k answerable​:contentReference[oaicite:20]{index=20} (train: 92k, dev: 5k, test: 5k). Data size ~200 MB.
download: https://github.com/Maluuba/NewsQA (contains the dataset in JSON, under license CC BY-NC-SA 3.0). Also on HuggingFace as `newsqa`.
notes: Answers are spans in the article (or occasionally unanswerable). The questions often require inference or combining information, aiming to be more challenging than surface word matching.
